I had the privilege of speaking to Ben Felix, Ottawa-based PM and host of the Rational Reminder podcast and Common Sense Investing YouTube channel. We talked investing, market efficiency, and research around crypto.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/ThePlainBagel :)
